name: zhoplist
description: Modern mobile-first shopping list app with glassmorphism design built for Cloudflare's free tier

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:frontend: echo 'Deploy frontend via Cloudflare Pages connected to git repository'
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist backend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && npx wrangler d1 migrations apply zhoplist-db --local

author: Zhoplist Team
